attributes.userName: mrs. my dog is probably dead
attributes.title: it stole my dog!!!
attributes.review: so i downloaded this app looking for a new social media cuz tiktok is being banned, but as soon as i opened this app it began to call me many slurs. the voice sounded like.. my father?! it then tracked my location to the chinese government! it then started sending me notifications telling me trump was my biological father?! then trump showed up at my house with a gun and stole my dog!! what should i do??

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: I have no words to describe how terrible this app is. I was speechless and disappointed to see that it is still on the App Store and that it even exists. I would give it zero stars if possible.
